data.md:MetaData: Loss on ignition on sediment samples of core ANTU, Åntu Sinijarv, Estonia

Southern part of modern lake. Core diameter: 8 cm. Area: 2.4 ha. Lake, spring-fed, closed, thin fen margi. Physiography: near esker ridge on Pandivere uplands. Surrounding vegetation: pine and Corylus, Betula and Alnus rare
Geology of the Äntu group of lakes
